titleStmt.title: An inquiry concerning virtue in two discourses, viz., I. of virtue and the belief of a deity, II. of the obligations to virtue.
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1671-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. Bell ... E. Castle ... and S. Buckley ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Anthony Ashley Cooper Shaftesbury. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
An unauthorized ed., published by John Toland. Shaftesbury bought and destroyed most of the copies.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
